titles.title: HOPE Act of 2024
Harnessing Opportunities by Pursuing Expungement Act of 2024
HOPE Act of 2024

A bill to authorize the Attorney General to make grants to States, units of local government, and Indian Tribes to reduce the financial and administrative burden of expunging convictions for cannabis offenses, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
